```{python}
import numpy as np
```

```{python}
def gen_data(start, stop, step, n_frames):
    X = []
    Y = []
    for i in range(start, stop+step, step):
        sample = [ i+j*step for j in range(n_frames) ]
        X.append(sample)
        Y.append(i+n_frames*step)
    
    #X = np.array(X)
    #X = X.reshape((*X.shape,1))
    #Y = np.array(Y)
        
    return X, Y
```
